detail-introduction: I'm a web developer with over 4 years of experience, fully immersing myself in both front-end and back-end technologies. On the front-end side, I'm adept at using HTML, CSS, Tailwind, JavaScript, React, and Next.js. When it comes to back-end development, I specialize in TypeScript, Node.js, and NestJS. Additionally, I'm well-versed in Linux operations and CI/CD processes, ensuring robust and smooth deployments. My commitment to the field remains unwavering, guided by the belief, 'A thousand mile trip begins with one step.'
name: Miwen
